title: Effort to fight African blindness wins $1.1M eyesight prize
text: Effort to fight African blindness wins $1.1M eyesight prize Tuesday, 8 September 2015 (8 minutes ago) Three institutions that work together to fight blindness and poverty in Africa are sharing a 1 million euro ($1.1 million) prize from a Portuguese foundation. Three institutions that work together to fight blindness and poverty in Africa are sharing a 1 million euro ($1.1 million) prize from a Portuguese foundation.
